revision.text: Possibly: An universal history, from the beginning of the world, to the empire of Charlemagne / written originally in French by M. Bossuet, late Bishop of Meaux, formerly preceptor to the Dauphin ; in two volumes. (Jacques BÄ—nigne Bossuet, Discours sur l'histoire universelle). (Aberdeen : Printed by and for Francis Douglass and William Murray, M,DCC,LV [1755]) http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b1696701~S1
